name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XI
name_original: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XI
description:
Romance of the Three Kingdoms XI is a strategy game developed by KOEI. It came out on 09-09-2008. Koei published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Romance of the Three Kingdoms XI is available on PlayStation 2 and PC.
Shinji Imura directed the game. It was scored by Yoshihiro Ike.
